descriptionHtml:
Since I don't have a working computer atm.. This mods resources are free use to anyone who chooses to do so. Please give credit of you would be so kind. Cheers

                     The Moon that Never Sets

If you like this mod....Please Endorse it.

This Re-texture is considered Non-Lore Friendly.
 They"re for comments about such will be disregarded. You have been warned!



Comments,Questions, are welcomed, Trolls not welcome..shoo!!

In astronomy a Moon that Never Sets cannot exist....Stars travel the sky by catching the winds of time but this moon is not effected by time it never moves day or night. Thus being called the Moon that Never Sets. After counting 108 years when the moon that never sets glows red a moon child descends to fill the world with holy bliss... however what we really get is the the spawning of destruction and fear...The Black Monster. Why a demon...and not a blessing? What does it mean?

The mystery has yet to be resolved.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Masser Texture Replacer for TESV:Skyrim based on The Moon that Never Sets from Legend of Dragoon RPG on PS1

if anyone is interested in more LoD mods fellow modder naruundi has made a Dragon Buster sword mod!   mods/52738 

Author: JediDragoon
Version: 1.2.5 (3/9/2013)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4241

This file is exclusive to Skyrim Nexus; therefore re-uploading to any other Non-Nexus sites is prohibited.

Conversion for any other games hosted on the Nexus Mods is ok as long as u seek my permission first and credit me appropriately.

Using content from this file in your mod is ok as long as u credit me in your description/readmes.

Translations are fine and need no permissions put please list me in the credits

<<<<<<< Mod Requirements >>>>>>>>
-Legal Copy of Skyrim (works with any version of Skyrim, but i recommend you always keep your game updated.)
-Latest Version of Nexus Mod Manager (Optional)

<<<<<<<<< Change Log >>>>>>>>>>>>>

v1.2.1 - Organized uploaded file to include main file and optional with a Readme.

v1.2.0 - Added Blood red moon

v1.1.0 - Added 2 more satellite moons for a total of 4. Some slight recoloring

v1.0.0 - Initial Release (1 Moon Variant - Blue)


<<<<<<<< Install >>>>>>>>>>>

_With NMM_
-Click the "Download with Manager" button on the Mods Page
-In NMM, activate the mod with the button on the left side column

_Manual_
-Copy over all folders from the compressed archive to your Skyrim Directory Location. ({Hard Drive}/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)

<<<<<<<< Uninstall >>>>>>>>>>

_With NMM_
-Deactivate in NMM

_Manual-
-Remove all .dds files names Masser from (skyrim/data/textures/sky) folder

<<<<<< Recommended Mods >>>>>>

Enhanced Night Sky Skyrim (CptJoker)

Project Reality/Climates of Tamriel (jjc71)

Shooting Stars (Isoku)

Realistic Lighting Overhaul (RLO Team)

<<<< Credits >>>>

AkinDain for his permission to use his moon textures as resources
SCEA (Sony Computer Entertainment America)
Adobe
Nvidia
Robin Scott aka Dark0ne for creating the Nexus Mods sites, Nexus Admins & Moderators and Nexus Mod Manager Team
Bethesda for Skyrim and making their games so modable and fun
